field.name: summary
field.value: Default output in Brail should be HTML encoded

field.name: description
field.value:
The ${variable} output command in the Brail view engine should apply HTML encoding by default to prevent script injection/cross-site scripting.
A non-encoded command/option will need to be available for those cases where the value contains HTML but as this can open up for attack it must be clearly distinguished so that the user is aware of what he is doing and takes responsibility for the data contained with. I would suggest something like $raw{variable}
